Tanks

类 App

  • java.lang.Object
    • processing.core.PApplet
      • Tanks.App
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    processing.core.PConstants

    public class App
extends processing.core.PApplet
    The main class that represents the game application. Extends the PApplet class from the Processing library.

        keyReleased 在类中 processing.core.PApplet

      • keyReleased

        public void keyReleased(processing.event.KeyEvent event)
        Handles key release events for game control. This method stops specific actions of the current player based on the key released.

        - Arrow keys up (38) and down (40): Stop the turret rotation. - Arrow keys left (37) and right (39): Stop the player movement. - W (87) and S (83) keys: Stop adjusting the power level. - Spacebar (32): Records the current time to track the duration of key press.

        覆盖:
        keyReleased 在类中 processing.core.PApplet
        参数:
        event - the KeyEvent that contains details about the key that was released.

      • mousePressed

        public void mousePressed(processing.event.MouseEvent e)
        Handles mouse press events to activate player power-ups, such as teleportation. If the current player is alive and able to use teleport, this method will teleport the player to the clicked location on the screen.

        - Teleportation is performed by setting the player's position to the coordinates of the mouse click, provided the player has the ability to teleport at that time.

        覆盖:
        mousePressed 在类中 processing.core.PApplet
        参数:
        e - the MouseEvent that contains details about the mouse button pressed and the coordinates of the mouse cursor at the time of the press.

      • mouseReleased

        public void mouseReleased(processing.event.MouseEvent e)
        Handles mouse release events to stop player power-ups.
        覆盖:
        mouseReleased 在类中 processing.core.PApplet
